mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes the articles entitled "Pappy's Kids", "Forming A Square Dance Club?", "A New Introduction", "The Younger Set", "What Lies Ahead", "Country Dancing Comes To The City", and "Hints On The Care And Feeding Of Floors". This edition also includes the monthly articles entitled "On the Record", "The Square of the Month" and "Idea Corral". Located in the back of the issue is a "Southern California Square Dance Directory", "News From Other Parts of the Country" and "Schedule of Events for November".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
